translated: The ghee is clear, the sesame oil is bubbly, and the paste is smooth.

original: chu nang 'bying zhing gyes mi 'gyur //
analyzed: chu nang 'bying zhing gyes mi 'gyur //
translated: It sinks in the water and does not separate.

original: tshos pa'i tshad ni rnam gsum ste //🔽'jam tshos 'byar bag 'byar la rtsub //
analyzed: tshos pa'i tshad ni rnam gsum ste // 'jam tshos 'byar bag 'byar la rtsub //
translated: The measure of cooking is threefold:🔽smooth cooking, sticky cooking, and rough cooking.

original: 'jam tshos tshig ma lde gu 'dra //
analyzed: 'jam tshos tshig ma lde gu 'dra //
translated: Smooth cooking is like a paste.

original: 'byar bag sbrang rtsi lta bu yin //
analyzed: 'byar bag sbrang rtsi lta bu yin //
translated: Sticky cooking is like honey.

original: cung zad tshig cing mdog gnag par //
analyzed: cung zad tshig cing mdog gnag par //
translated: Slightly cooked, with a dark color,

original: snang 'gyur de ni tha ma yin ;
analyzed: snang 'gyur de ni tha ma yin ;
translated: that is the lowest.

original: / de las 'das par don mi byed //
analyzed: / de las 'das par don mi byed //
translated: Beyond that, it does not serve the purpose.

original: mtshos me drod nyams par byed //🔽'jam tshos snar btang rtsub pas bsku //
analyzed: mtshos me drod nyams par byed // 'jam tshos snar btang rtsub pas bsku //
translated: Cooking fire weakens the potency.🔽Smooth cooking is applied first, rough cooking is applied later.

original: btung dang 'jam rtsi 'byar bag bya //
analyzed: btung dang 'jam rtsi 'byar bag bya //
translated: Drink and smooth ointments are sticky.

original: sha na kar sha lag mthil dang // spar gang phul bre aa da ka / dro na ba ha rim bzhin du //
analyzed: sha na kar sha lag mthil dang // spar gang phul bre aa da ka / dro na ba ha rim bzhin du //
translated: One śaṇa, one karṣa, one palmful, one prastha, one āḍhaka, one droṇa, one bahala,

original: bzhi 'gyur yin par shes par bya //🔽rlon pa nyis 'gyur sbyar bya zhing //
analyzed: bzhi 'gyur yin par shes par bya // rlon pa nyis 'gyur sbyar bya zhing //
translated: should be known as four times the preceding one.🔽The wet ones should be doubled.

original: gsher pa phul gang stsogs de bzhin //
analyzed: gsher pa phul gang stsogs de bzhin //
translated: One prastha of the moist ones and so forth.

original: btags te sbrus nas gsher med pa'i //
analyzed: btags te sbrus nas gsher med pa'i //
translated: Having mixed and kneaded,

original: snum bskol ba la chu gzhug bya //
analyzed: snum bskol ba la chu gzhug bya //
translated: water should be added to the dry ones.

original: gang du tshad ni ma bshad pa //
analyzed: gang du tshad ni ma bshad pa //
translated: Where the measure is not explained,

original: der ni cha mnyam sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: der ni cha mnyam sbyar bar bya //
translated: there it should be mixed in equal parts.🔽Two śaṇas are one badaka,🔽two of those are one karṣa,

original: sha na gnyis la ba da ka / de gnyis kar sha go la dang // ba ru ra dang drang 'khru med //
analyzed: sha na gnyis la ba da ka / de gnyis kar sha go la dang // ba ru ra dang drang 'khru med //
translated: one karṣa is one golava, one varuṇa, one drona,

original: aa ksha bi tsu su barna //🔽lag mthil kham tshad byi la'i sder //
analyzed: aa ksha bi tsu su barna // lag mthil kham tshad byi la'i sder //
translated: one aksha, one vitsa, one suvarṇa,🔽one palmful is one bīlāṅgula.

original: tin du ka dang lag pa'i tshad //
analyzed: tin du ka dang lag pa'i tshad //
translated: One tinduka is one hasta.

original: sgra gzhan don ni gcig pa yin //
analyzed: sgra gzhan don ni gcig pa yin //
translated: The other terms have the same meaning.

original: shu ti brgyad pa pi tsu yin //
analyzed: shu ti brgyad pa pi tsu yin //
translated: Eight śūkas is one picu.

original: srang gcig bil ba pra kun dza //
analyzed: srang gcig bil ba pra kun dza //
translated: One pala is one bilva, one prakuñca,

original: spar gang aa mra bzhi po yin ;
analyzed: spar gang aa mra bzhi po yin ;
translated: one prastha is one āmalaka, the four are one prastha.

original: / gcig gi ming gi rnam grangs yin //
analyzed: / gcig gi ming gi rnam grangs yin //
translated: One is a synonym of the other.

original: srang gnyis khyor gang de gnyis la //
analyzed: srang gnyis khyor gang de gnyis la //
translated: Two pala is one khyor.🔽Two khyor is one snum.🔽Two snum is one ma ni ka.🔽Two ma ni ka is one a da ka.🔽Two a da ka is one snod kan.🔽Two snod kan is one dro na.

original: snyim gang de gnyis ma ni ka / aa da ka dang snod kan sa //
analyzed: snyim gang de gnyis ma ni ka / aa da ka dang snod kan sa //
translated: Two dro na is one kum pa.

original: dro na kum pa bum chen yin //
analyzed: dro na kum pa bum chen yin //
translated: Two kum pa is one bum chen.🔽Two bum chen is one tula.

original: tu la srang ni brgya yin te //🔽de nyi shu la khur du bshad //
analyzed: tu la srang ni brgya yin te // de nyi shu la khur du bshad //
translated: Twenty tula is one khur.

original: gangs can 'bigs byed ri yis ni //
analyzed: gangs can 'bigs byed ri yis ni //
translated: The Himalayas and Vindhya mountains

original: sa gzhi phal cher khyab pa yin //
analyzed: sa gzhi phal cher khyab pa yin //
translated: cover most of the land.

original: de las dang por bsil zhing phan //
analyzed: de las dang por bsil zhing phan //
translated: First, they are cool and beneficial.

original: 'bigs byed sman ni me'i rang bzhin //🔽yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //🔽cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o /
analyzed: 'bigs byed sman ni me'i rang bzhin // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las // cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o /
translated: The Vindhya mountain herbs are of a fiery nature.

original: // / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /🔽cho ga grub pa'i @248a * //
analyzed: // / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las / cho ga grub pa'i @248a * //
translated: This concludes chapter six, the chapter on the site for accomplishing the rite, from this Ornament of the Essence: A Commentary on the Condensed Meaning of the Eight Branches.

original: gnas te gnas lnga pa lus gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so /
analyzed: gnas te gnas lnga pa lus gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the fifth chapter on the branch of healing the body from this Ornament of the Essence: A Commentary on the Condensed Meaning of the Eight Branches.

original: // / de nas byis pa gso ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: // / de nas byis pa gso ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the chapter on the rite of healing children will be explained.

original: de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar bshad de /
analyzed: de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar bshad de /
translated: This is explained by the great sages such as Ātreya:

original: byis pa btsas ma thag phru ma //
analyzed: byis pa btsas ma thag phru ma //
translated: Immediately after the child is born,

original: bsal te rgyam tsha mar bskus sbyang //
analyzed: bsal te rgyam tsha mar bskus sbyang //
translated: the placenta should be removed and the child cleaned with ghee and oil.

original: de 'og btsas pas sdug bsngal la //
analyzed: de 'og btsas pas sdug bsngal la //
translated: After that, the suffering of birth,

original: ba la'i tel mar blugs par bya //
analyzed: ba la'i tel mar blugs par bya //
translated: like a cow’s udder being filled with milk,

original: de yi rna ba'i drung du ni //
analyzed: de yi rna ba'i drung du ni //
translated: should be placed near the child’s ear

original: rdo gnyis brdungs par spyad par bya //
analyzed: rdo gnyis brdungs par spyad par bya //
translated: and two stones should be rubbed together.

original: de nas de yi rna ba ni //
analyzed: de nas de yi rna ba ni //
translated: Then, into the child’s right ear,

original: g-yas par sngags 'di brjod par bya //
analyzed: g-yas par sngags 'di brjod par bya //
translated: this mantra should be spoken:

original: yan lag yan lag las byung khyod ;
analyzed: yan lag yan lag las byung khyod ;
translated: “You who are born from the limbs,

original: / snying las mngon par bskyed pa yin //
analyzed: / snying las mngon par bskyed pa yin //
translated: you who are generated from the heart,

original: bdag nyid bu zhes bya ba khyod //🔽lo brgyar yang dag 'tsho 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: bdag nyid bu zhes bya ba khyod // lo brgyar yang dag 'tsho 'gyur zhing //
translated: you who are called ‘my child,’🔽may you live for a hundred years.

original: lo brgya thub cing ston brgya 'tsho //
analyzed: lo brgya thub cing ston brgya 'tsho //
translated: May you live for a hundred years, may you live for a hundred autumns,🔽may you attain a long life.🔽May the stars, the directions, the nights,🔽and the days protect you.

original: tshe ring por ni thob gyur cig / rgyu skar phyogs dang mtshan mo dang // nyin mos khyod ni bsrung bar shog / bde bar gyur na lte ba ni ;
analyzed: tshe ring por ni thob gyur cig / rgyu skar phyogs dang mtshan mo dang // nyin mos khyod ni bsrung bar shog / bde bar gyur na lte ba ni ;
translated: When well, the navel

original: / sor bzhi'i 'og tu srad bus bcing //
analyzed: / sor bzhi'i 'og tu srad bus bcing //
translated: should be tied with a string four finger-widths below.

original: de yi 'og tu bcad nas ni //
analyzed: de yi 'og tu bcad nas ni //
translated: After that, having cut it,

original: lte ba la ni brtod de bzhag / de 'og lte bar ru rta yi //
analyzed: lte ba la ni brtod de bzhag / de 'og lte bar ru rta yi //
translated: Below that, the navel is on the wheel.
